title: The history of the civil wars of France written in Italian, by H.C. Davila ; translated out of the original.
author: Davila, Arrigo Caterino, 1576-1631.
publisher: Printed by T.N. for Henry Herringman ...,
notes: "An alphabetical table ..." [i.e. index]: p. [1]-[15] at end.
Translation by William Aylesbury and Sir Charles Cotterell, first published London, 1647. Cf. BM and DNB.
Translation of: Historia delle guerre civili di Francia.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
